t: How Do I Check If a Brand Name Is In Use on Amazon?
s: Amazon will approve you unless it is an obvious violation from the start. None of their representatives are going to sit there and look up whether or not that brand name already exists. Chances are good you got reported from whoever owns the original brand you named your brand after.
